x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Local languages, traditions, crafts, and oral histories are rapidly disappearing due to urbanization, generational gaps, and lack of digital documentation. Youth often grow up disconnected from their cultural roots, while elders struggle to pass on knowledge in a format that resonates with modern audiences. NGOs, schools, and cultural groups lack a unified platform to capture, share, and celebrate local heritage in a way that’s interactive, sponsor-friendly, and accessible across generations.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Youth and elders can co-create digital entries for local traditions, crafts, recipes, festivals, and stories
  • Each entry includes photos, voice notes, videos, and written narratives
  • QR codes link to interactive galleries at schools, museums, and events
  • Dashboards show regional contributions, engagement metrics, and sponsor impact
  • Contributors receive digital badges and certificates for preserving culture
  • Optional: Storytelling challenges and cultural hackathons to boost participation

Capabilities:

  • App Engine Studio for cultural record types, contributor profiles, and media uploads
  • Flow Designer for submission approvals, recognition workflows, and sponsor updates
  • UI Builder for interactive galleries and dashboards
  • IntegrationHub for syncing with media platforms or school portals
  • Attachment API for uploading photos, audio, and video content
  • QR Code Generation & Base64 Encoding for gallery access and story sharing
  • Scoped App with ACLs for privacy, moderation, and contributor roles

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Optional: YouTube or Instagram API for story sharing
  • QR code generation for gallery access and contributor recognition
  • Optional: Translation APIs for multilingual storytelling
  • Optional: Gamification engine for badges and challenge

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring authenticity and respectful representation of cultural content
  • Designing a simple, mobile-first UX for youth and elders
  • Encouraging diverse participation across regions and languages
  • Balancing privacy and visibility for sensitive stories
  • Building trust and adoption among cultural groups and schools
